# **My Hello to You \~**

Hello there! My name is Marzuki Nooranas - or *Marz* for short! I am currently in my 2nd year, double majoring in Sociology and, Communications and New Media!

I have always been fascinated by how society functions and its intricate connections, my passion for understanding the world around us, is driven by a desire to foster meaningful connections within all communities!

To demonstrate this, I embark of frequent backpacking trips across Southeast Asia, and actively engage myself in the cultures and learn about their customs.

# **My Past Work**

## National University of Singapore

### DTK1234 - Design Thinking

In this module, we were assigned the task of innovating everyday chores. Here is my idea: it is basically an attachment that can be clipped to an existing ironing board, so that people - including the elderly or people with disabilities - can iron clothes without feeling tired or unsafe

![](images/prototyping.png){fig-align="center"}

The actual prototyping journey was not very smooth, but hey, here is the end product! Looks good aye? To me at least...

![](images/prototyping_2-01.png)

## Temasek Polytechnic

### Savvify - An Automated Savings Platform

During my time in Temasek Polytechnic, my group mates and I worked on an automated savings platform - ***Savvify***. Essentially, the application helps users to round up your payment transactions to the nearest dollar, and crediting it to the users' e-wallet upon making QR Payments.

Our main goal was to bring new solutions e-payment solutions while helping young adults like us, to understand real life responsibilities - improving their financial literacy!

{{< video https://youtu.be/kzWq31_mRyc >}}

### GIGAWipes - Innovation through Programming

"Innovation does not stop" -- Here, we explored how to incorporate programming in our daily lives. This may or may not be inspired by true events but for this project, we created a prototype of a toilet roll dispenser but... I'll let the video do the talking...
